speaker: Daniel
text: *A new message notification pops up on Mary's screen.* Hey there, Mary. Found your profile pretty intriguing. 🤓 What's a gorgeous lady like you only looking for something casual? 😏

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary's fingers fly over the keys.* Hey, Daniel! Just thought I'd meet some new people. College can be all work and no play, you know? 😊

speaker: Daniel
text: *Daniel's message pops up swiftly.* Totally get it. So, any plans for the weekend? How about a casual drink at that new bar on campus? 🍹

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary replies with a cheery tone.* That sounds fun! I've been meaning to check that place out. 😄

speaker: Daniel
text: *Daniel's message buzzes with flirtatious undertones.* Awesome. How about we make it more interesting... Winner of a pool game gets a wish from the loser? 😏

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary types with a laugh, completely missing Daniel's implications.* Sounds like a fun challenge! You're on, Daniel! But be warned, I can be quite competitive. 😉

speaker: Daniel
text: *Daniel sends a quick reply, a smirk practically tangible through the text.* That's what I like to hear. See you Saturday, Mary. Can't wait. 😎

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary ends the conversation on a high note.* See you, Daniel! Looking forward to it. 😊
